# cloudtemple_marketplace_items (Data Source)

Used to retrieve a list of items from the marketplace.

To query this datasource you will need the `` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_marketplace_items" "all" {
}

data "cloudtemple_marketplace_items" "ubuntu" {
  name = "ubuntu"
}

output "all_items_count" {
  value = length(data.cloudtemple_marketplace_items.all.marketplace_items)
}

output "ubuntu_items" {
  value = [for item in data.cloudtemple_marketplace_items.ubuntu.marketplace_items : {
    id      = item.id
    name    = item.name
    version = item.version
    editor  = item.editor
  }]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) Filter items by name (case-insensitive partial match).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `marketplace_items` (List of Object) List of marketplace items matching the filter criteria. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--marketplace_items))
